name: DefaultAssetBundle
desc: A widget that determines the default asset bundle for its descendants.

fields.name: bundle
fields.desc: The bundle to use as a default.

nodes.name: Introduction to DefaultAssetBundle
desc: We can define our own DefaultAssetBundle for use by subsequent nodes, or we can directly use the default one. This case demonstrates loading and displaying a resource image using the DefaultAssetBundle provided by the framework.
